item.title: workshop redhat storage and splunk
item.description: Instance Details Replace userX with your user id. For example, user1 –> user 30 Instance DNS IP **Internal** RHS 01 rhs-01.userX.apac.red 10.100.0.101 RHS 02 rhs-02.userX.apac.red 10.100.0.102 RHS 03 rhs-03.userX.apac.red 10.100.0.103 RHS 04 rhs-04.userX.apac.red 10.100.0.104 Splunk Master splunkmaster.userX.apac.red 10.100.0.201 Splunk Search splunksearch.userX.apac.red 10.100.0.202 Splunk Peer 01 splunkpeer-01.
